_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The perceptions meditated upon by Moggal: As by day, so by night
As by night, so by day
The achievements of Moggallāna [sn51.14:: By developing and cultivating the four bases of psychic power
Moggallāna wields the many kinds of psychic power
Controlling the body as far as the Brahmā realm
Moggallāna realizes the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life
He lives having realized it with his own insight due to the ending of defilements.
